humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the left axillary sentinel lymph nodes (10 in total) were negative for tumor (AJCC PN0(1-)(sn)). Based on the new rules 10 and 11, N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that multiple (10) sentinel lymph nodes were excised from the left axillary and were negative for tumor (AJCC PN0(1-)(sn)). This indicates that there is no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N0 stage.
